1.0.3.name: wordpress/jabze-chat
1.0.3.description:
Jabze (http://www.jabze.com) is an industrial strength and IT friendly messenger service, with a great mobile experience. We have now extended its functionalities to the WordPress community, so that web masters can easily enable web site users to chat with each other on the site.

This Jabze Chat plug-in is non-intrudive to your WordPress installation, we use a very minimal number of hooks and it won't break your WordPress installation in any way.

You do not need an existing Jabze account. All you need is to "activate" your WordPress installation with us in the configuration menu, an account will be automatically created for you. Our service is free for the first 100 users. Beyond that we ask for a moderate fee.

Major features are:

  • Full XMPP-compliant IM service.
  • Automatically embedded JavaScript IM client on every page (for registered users).
  • No software to install for your user
